about_the_game:
Echoes of Myth is a roguelite soulslike set in a broken, ever-changing fantasy world where gods have fallen silent. Choose your class and path, tactically battling enemies and bosses. Collect unique loot, unlock talents, and permanently enhance your character. Die, learn, and rise stronger.

Soulslike Combat

Engage in challenging combat against formidable enemies and bosses. Utilize a mix of melee attacks and spells, relying on well-timed dodges and parries to survive. Choose from different classes, each offering a unique weapon, spells, and talents that fit your playstyle.

Explore a Fragmented Fantasy World

Navigate through a broken, ever-changing realm where gods have fallen silent. Chart your own course through multiple routes filled with secrets and mysteries to uncover. Each path offers new challenges and discoveries in this dynamic world.

Permanent Progression and Customization

Collect different mythic essences to unlock permanent upgrades that enhance your character across all iterations. Hunt for powerful items and the perfect Eternalized Legacy to customize your abilities. Grow stronger with each attempt, as your progression persists beyond death.

Features

  • Soulslike Combat: Battle enemies and bosses using a mix of melee attacks and spells, with well-timed dodges and parries crucial for survival.

  • Class Selection: Choose from different classes, each offering unique weapon, spells and talents to suit your playstyle.

  • Permanent Progression: Collect mythic essence to unlock permanent upgrades and hunt for the perfect Eternalized Legacy.

  • Dynamic Paths: Chart your own course through the world with multiple routes and secrets.

  • Unique Loot: Gather powerful items to customize and enhance your character.

  • Prophecies: Unlock prophecies that affect future iterations and shape your journey.

  • Mysteries to Uncover: Discover the mysteries behind the broken and fragmented world.

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
